content: The full Centipede Set of Armor and Gear is located within Chapter 4 - The Webbed Hollow. It is craftable at any Shrine upon finishing the chapter. Simply rest at the next Shrine to unlock it in the crafting menu.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Centipede_Set.md', within the main section titled 'Centipede Set'.
The content is as follows:
The full Centipede Set of Armor and Gear is located within Chapter 4 - The Webbed Hollow. It is craftable at any Shrine upon finishing the chapter. Simply rest at the next Shrine to unlock it in the crafting menu.
